text: Zisas maaŋ ana nzuaim, mba guma kha nzambaran Zisas ga muuŋgi, “Ndu ram mbui khesharigi tɨvi, ndu nta nzuai?” Zisas mbara khaŋ ana nzuai, “Mba Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tɨvi, nta khaŋ nzuai, ‘Nde harigi gumgi gu mbigi shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzɨ thari. Nde mani gu mburi ga rɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde ruarin harigi gumgi gu mbigi ndi thari. Ne kɨmɨ thari. Nde fhura guiguigip harigi gumgi gu mbigi ga suaŋv suaŋ thari.
